structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Office Of Jury Commissioner For The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Presentation By Juror To Clerk Of Summons, Questionnaire And Notices
law.text: On the first day of his term of grand or trial juror service, each juror shall bring to court and present to the officer in charge of jurors his summons, his confidential juror questionnaire, duly completed and signed, and any subsequent notices of postponement or location transfer received by him. Notice of these duties shall appear prominently on the summons, questionnaire, and notice of postponement, respectively.
